mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( writer_emp_no, dept_code, notice_title, notice_content, notice_view, is_pinned, create_datetime, update_datetime ) VALUES ( #{writerEmpNo}, #{deptCode}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, 0, #{isPinned}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.sql: notice_file_no , notice_no , origin_file_name , file_name , file_ext , file_type , create_datetime , update_datetime
mapper.select: SELECT division_code divisionCode , division_name divisionName FROM division

WITH noticeList AS ( (SELECT n.notice_no, n.writer_emp_no, e.emp_name, n.dept_code, COALESCE(di1.division_code, di2.division_code) AS division_code, COALESCE(di1.division_name, di2.division_name, 'ALL') AS division_name, n.notice_title, n.notice_view, n.create_datetime, n.is_pinned FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN department d ON n.dept_code = d.dept_code LEFT OUTER JOIN division di1 ON d.division_code = di1.division_code LEFT OUTER JOIN division di2 ON n.dept_code = di2.division_code LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON n.writer_emp_no = e.emp_no
(COALESCE(di1.division_code, di2.division_code) LIKE #{division} OR di1.division_code IS NULL)
AND n.is_pinned = 'Y'
)
UNION ALL
(SELECT n.notice_no, n.writer_emp_no, e.emp_name, n.dept_code, COALESCE(di1.division_code, di2.division_code) AS division_code, COALESCE(di1.division_name, di2.division_name, 'ALL') AS division_name, n.notice_title, n.notice_view, n.create_datetime, n.is_pinned FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN department d ON n.dept_code = d.dept_code LEFT OUTER JOIN division di1 ON d.division_code = di1.division_code LEFT OUTER JOIN division di2 ON n.dept_code = di2.division_code LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON n.writer_emp_no = e.emp_no
n.notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTitle}, '%')
AND (COALESCE(di1.division_code, di2.division_code) LIKE #{division})
AND n.is_pinned = 'N'
) )
SELECT notice_no AS noticeNo, writer_emp_no AS empNo, emp_name AS empName, dept_code AS deptCode, division_code AS divisionCode, division_name AS divisionName, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_view AS noticeView, create_datetime AS createDate, is_pinned AS isPinned FROM noticeList ORDER BY CASE WHEN is_pinned = 'Y' THEN 0 -- Pinned notices appear first WHEN is_pinned = 'N' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END, create_datetime DESC -- Newer notices appear before older ones
mapper.update:
UPDATE notice
notice_title = #{noticeTitle},
notice_content = #{noticeContent},
is_pinned = #{isPinned},
update_datetime = now()
notice_view = notice_view + 1,
WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_no AS noticeNo , n.writer_emp_no AS writerEmpNo , e.emp_name AS empName , n.dept_code AS deptCode , di.division_code AS divisionCode , di.division_name AS divisionName , n.notice_title AS noticeTitle , n.notice_content AS noticeContent , n.notice_view AS noticeView , n.create_datetime AS createDateTime , n.is_pinned AS isPinned , IFNULL(nf.notice_file_no, 'No') AS noticeFileNo , IFNULL(nf.origin_file_name, 'No') AS originFileName , IFNULL(nf.file_name, 'No') AS fileName , IFNULL(nf.file_ext , 'No') AS fileExt , IFNULL(nf.file_type , 'No') AS fileType FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN department d ON n.dept_code = d.dept_code LEFT OUTER JOIN division di ON d.division_code = di.division_code LEFT OUTER JOIN employee e ON n.writer_emp_no = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN notice_file nf ON n.notice_no = nf.notice_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{noticeNo}
